knownIssues: Error recovery for corrupted files needs enhancement

Critical UI-console mismatch: Console shows successful processing (e.g., '29460 valid records from 29954 total') but UI displays '0 valid records, 0 skipped' - data processing succeeds but results not reflected in user interface

description: Comprehensive health data import system supporting multiple file formats from various health platforms and devices.
userFlow: User clicks 'Import Health Data' button in HealthDataSection.
HealthDataImport component renders with file upload interface.
User selects health data file (Apple Health XML, Google Fit JSON, CSV, etc.).
File is validated for format and size constraints.
Health data parser processes the file based on detected format.
Deduplication service identifies and handles duplicate records.
User reviews import preview with statistics (new records, duplicates, errors).
User confirms import or adjusts settings.
Data is batch imported into the database.
Health dashboard refreshes with new data.
Import results are displayed to user.

supportedFormats.description: Complete health data export from iOS Health app
Google Takeout health and fitness data
Custom CSV format with date, metric, value columns

systemFlow: HealthDataImport component validates file size and format
useFileUpload handles secure file transmission to server
Server performs batch insertion into healthData table

integrationGaps: UI state not updating with import results - cache invalidation or component refresh issue

knownIssues: Import results not reflecting in UI despite successful backend processing
Console logs show successful data processing but UI components display zero results - indicates cache invalidation or state update failure

errorHandling: UI-console synchronization validation - ensure processed results are properly displayed to user

performance.streaming: Large files processed in chunks to prevent memory issues
performance.progressTracking: Real-time progress updates for user feedback
